page.title: 17MY LIFE 3
page.content: In their spare time many people enjoy playing sports like squash,golf, tennis,football,snooker,cricket,darts, swimming,running and athletics, Some sports are watched a lot on the television which also gives us a lot of our entertainment. We watch things like cartoons,films,sports and series. Small children tend to watch cartoons about animals that can talk and make believe like that. Older children like adventure cartoons. The most popular programmes are detective stories and films. We watch films about James Bond - a secret agent, horror and war films. Many people watch soap operas like Dallas and Dynasty which are about the lives of American millionaires, others watch things like Coronation Street and Eastenders which are about the lives of British people in certain areas.
